thread.title: Nyasha Pitt
thread.title_full: Rapid Formations reviewed by Nyasha Pitt

author: Nyasha Pitt
title: Nyasha Pitt
text: Starting a new business is fairly daunting and the first step to making it real can be equally unnerving. Rapid Formations made it all so easy though! 20 minutes or so to complete the online form and two days later, everything had been filed, processed and my company became a real entity, registered with Companies House. The website is full of great advice and the terms and fees are great value for money. I would highly recommend them.
